actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to provide for paper money of the United States to carry a designation in braille indicating the denomination.

summary.text: Requires that all paper money of the United States bear a designation in braille indicating the denomination of the bill.

titles.title: A bill to provide for paper money of the United States to carry a designation in braille indicating the denomination.
